mapper.select: select count(*) from app_info where APKName=#{APKName}

SELECT i.id, i.`softwareName`, i.`APKName`, i.`supportROM`, i.`interfaceLanguage`, i.`softwareSize`, i.`updateDate`, i.`devId`, i.`appInfo`, i.`status`, i.`onSaleDate`, i.`offSaleDate`, i.`flatformId`, i.`categoryLevel1`, i.`categoryLevel2`, i.`categoryLevel3`, i.`downloads`, i.`createdBy`, i.`modifyBy`, i.`modifyDate`, i.`logoLocPath`, i.`logoPicPath` , i.`versionId`, category1.categoryName categoryLevel1Name, category2.categoryName categoryLevel2Name, category3.categoryName categoryLevel3Name, app_status.valueName statusName, APP_FLATFORM.valueName flatformName, u.`devName`,v.`versionNo` FROM `app_info` i LEFT JOIN `app_version` v ON i.`versionId` = v.`id` INNER JOIN `dev_user` u ON i.`devId` = u.`id` INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM `data_dictionary` WHERE typeCode="APP_STATUS") app_status ON i.`status` = app_status.valueId INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM `data_dictionary` WHERE typeCode="APP_FLATFORM") APP_FLATFORM ON i.`flatformId` = APP_FLATFORM.valueId INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM `app_category` WHERE parentId IS NULL) category1 ON i.`categoryLevel1` = category1.id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM `app_category` WHERE parentId =1 OR parentId = 2) category2 ON i.`categoryLevel2` = category2.id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM `app_category` WHERE parentId IS NOT NULL AND parentId <> 1 AND parentId <> 2) category3 ON i.`categoryLevel3` = category3.id
where i.id=#{id}
